name: Do Donuts
description:
Surprise your family with these easy to make donuts! You are in for a delicious treat as you follow simple instructions and make these sweet treats!
Features:
•Realistic donut images for an enhanced experience.
•Easy to follow steps.
•Fun actions of tilting, pouring and shaking device.
•Attractive plates to present your donut.
•Choose from colorful backgrounds.
•Amazing varieties of flavors and toppings.
•Earn coins and stars to unlock many more flavors and toppings!

As these apps are free, they may contain third party advertisements.
